header.t-slogan: and I develop software for the XXI century.

about-me.t-about-p1: Hello! My name is Kaic Bento and I develop software for the web. I'm {{myAge}} years old, born and resident in São Paulo, Brazil. Currently I work as a JavaScript Developer with a focus on backend and microservices development.
